verses.verse: וְעָשָׂה֩ <WH6213> ve-'a-Sah Then wrought בְצַלְאֵ֨ל <WH1212> ve-tzal-'El Bezaleel וְאָהֳלִיאָ֜ב <WH171> ve-'o-ho-li-'Av and Aholiab וְכֹ֣ל׀ <WH3605> ve-Chol and every אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish man חֲכַם־ <WH2450> cha-cham- and every wise לֵ֗ב <WH3820> Lev, hearted אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> 'a-Sher whom נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> na-Tan put יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD חָכְמָ֤ה <WH2451> choch-mah wisdom וּתְבוּנָה֙ <WH8394> u-te-vu-Nah and understanding בָּהֵ֔מָּה <WH1992> ba-Hem-mah, in whom לָדַ֣עַת <WH3045> la-Da-'at to know לַעֲשֹׂ֔ת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot, how to work אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all מְלֶ֖אכֶת <WH4399> me-Le-chet all manner of work עֲבֹדַ֣ת <WH5656> 'a-vo-Dat for the service הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> hak-Ko-desh; of the sanctuary לְכֹ֥ל <WH3605> le-Chol all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- whom צִוָּ֖ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah had commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. according to all that the LORD

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra called מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about בְּצַלְאֵל֮ <WH1212> be-tzal-'El Bezaleel וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and אָֽהֳלִיאָב֒ <WH171> 'o-ho-li-'Av and Aholiab וְאֶל֙ <WH413> ve-'El and כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- every אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish man חֲכַם־ <WH2450> cha-cham- and every wise לֵ֔ב <WH3820> Lev, hearted אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom נָתַ֧ן <WH5414> na-Tan had put יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD חָכְמָ֖ה <WH2451> choch-mah wisdom בְּלִבּ֑וֹ <WH3820> be-lib-Bo; in whose heart כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> kol everyone אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whose נְשָׂא֣וֹ <WH5375> ne-sa-'O stirred him up לִבּ֔וֹ <WH3820> lib-Bo, [even] every one whose heart לְקָרְבָ֥ה <WH7126> le-ka-re-Vah to come אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַמְּלָאכָ֖ה <WH4399> ham-me-la-Chah unto the work לַעֲשֹׂ֥ת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot to do אֹתָֽהּ׃ <WH853> 'o-Tah.

וַיִּקְח֞וּ <WH3947> vai-yik-Chu And they received מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> mil-lif-Nei of מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, Moses אֵ֤ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַתְּרוּמָה֙ <WH8641> hat-te-ru-Mah all the offering אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which הֵבִ֜יאוּ <WH935> he-Vi-'u had brought בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei which the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לִמְלֶ֛אכֶת <WH4399> lim-Le-chet for the work עֲבֹדַ֥ת <WH5656> 'a-vo-Dat of the service הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> hak-Ko-desh of the sanctuary לַעֲשֹׂ֣ת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot to make אֹתָ֑הּ <WH853> 'o-Tah; וְ֠הֵם <WH1992> Ve-hem like הֵבִ֨יאוּ <WH935> he-Vi-'u it [withal] And they brought אֵלָ֥יו <WH413> 'e-Lav and ע֛וֹד <WH5750> od still נְדָבָ֖ה <WH5071> ne-da-Vah yet unto him free offerings בַּבֹּ֥קֶר <WH1242> bab-Bo-ker every morning בַּבֹּֽקֶר׃ <WH1242> bab-Bo-ker. morning

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo-'u came כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all הַ֣חֲכָמִ֔ים <WH2450> ha-cha-cha-Mim, And all the wise men הָעֹשִׂ֕ים <WH6213> ha-'o-Sim that wrought אֵ֖ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all מְלֶ֣אכֶת <WH4399> me-Le-chet all the work הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> hak-Ko-desh; of the sanctuary אִֽישׁ־ <WH376> 'ish- every man אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> 'ish each מִמְּלַאכְתּ֖וֹ <WH4399> mi-me-lach-To from his work אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah like עֹשִֽׂים׃ <WH6213> 'o-Sim. which they made

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru And they spake אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying מַרְבִּ֥ים <WH7235> mar-Bim much more הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am The people לְהָבִ֑יא <WH935> le-ha-Vi; bring מִדֵּ֤י <WH1767> mid-Dei than enough הָֽעֲבֹדָה֙ <WH5656> ha-'a-vo-Dah for the service לַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <WH4399> lam-me-la-Chah, of the work אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD לַעֲשֹׂ֥ת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot to make אֹתָֽהּ׃ <WH853> 'o-Tah.
